### EXISTING STRUCTURES

- Pipe (position -9.5, 22.5) connecting to the offshore pump

- Pipe (position -23.5, 26.5) connecting to the boiler

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure there are no placement blockages in the connection path before attempting to connect pipes. Check for any entities that may obstruct the connection.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting to place it. Check the surrounding area for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
